comments:
theh landmark marker in the java editor doesn't get updated immediately. 

steps to reproduce:
remove an existing landmark method either using the popup Mylar:mark less interesting or the shortcut shift+ctrl+alt down.
the marker in the editor is still there

expected behaviour
the marker should disappear

note:
increasing the interest for a method adds the landmark marker. Making the newl create landmark method less interesting removes the landmark marker again.

It seems as if the make less interesting works in the case of having a newly created landmark, but not if it has existed for a while.

A relevant exception:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule: R/, does not match outer scope rule: L/org.eclipse.mylar.bugzilla.ui/src/org/eclipse/mylar/internal/bugzilla/ui/tasklist/BugzillaRepositoryConnector.java
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ThreadJob.illegalPush(ThreadJob.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ThreadJob.push(ThreadJob.java:225)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs.begin(ImplicitJobs.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.beginRule(JobManager.java:219)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.WorkManager.checkIn(WorkManager.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.prepareOperation(Workspace.java:1684)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1732)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1719)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.java.ui.LandmarkMarkerManager.landmarkAdded(LandmarkMarkerManager.java:102)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.core.MylarContextManager.updateHandle(MylarContextManager.java:906)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.java.InterestUpdateDeltaListener$1.run(InterestUpdateDeltaListener.java:77)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)
I could not reproduce the job failure, but fixed up the marker management.  If you see this again in builds after tonight's dev build please reopen.
